full_summary:
================parsersmontada

### Tender Announcement: W0125-23WR10

#### Summary
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit a response to a Request for Proposal for the supply and delivery of various Petroleum, Oils and Lubricants (POL) products, on an 'as and when requested' basis.

#### Details

* **Reference Number:** WS3734123624
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3734123624
* **Publication Date:** 2022-11-04
* **Closing Date:** 2022-12-05 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-01-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-12-31
* **Procurement Category:** Good and Services
* **Undertaking Details:** The contract will be awarded to the lowest bidder.
* **Delivery Region:** Ontario (except NCR)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ **Name:** David Barltrop
	+ **Email:** david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ **Phone:** Not available
	+ **Fax:** Not available

#### Notice Description
**Please note that the closing time has been amended to 2:00 PM EST on 2022-12-05.** The Department of National Defence (DND), Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton requires the supply and delivery of various POL products, on an 'as and when requested' basis, for a period from 2023-01-01 to 2024-12-31.

#### Notice Type
This is a Request for Proposal under a competitive procurement process.

#### Regions of Opportunity
This tender is not restricted to any specific region(s).

#### Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN)
 None.

#### United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC)
15120000 - Lubricants and oils and greases and anti corrosives

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.

You can cross-reference this tender with the following Website:

* [Ariba Discovery platform](http://
